content: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you needing help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Hi! I was thinking about getting someone to look at my AC, but honestly, I'm pretty swamped right now. Probably can't schedule anything this month.
No worries at all! Would you like me to check our availability for next month, or would you rather reach out when your schedule frees up? I'm happy to assist whenever you're ready.
Thanks! I'll touch base when things slow down for me. Appreciate it!
Thank you for considering XYZ Home Services! Whenever you're ready, just let us know. Have a great day!
reason: Customer is too busy to schedule this month
